snippet: The no-frills nightclub gave an early start to Norah Jones and the Lumineers and hosted countless singer-songwriters in three locations over almost 18 years.
abstract: The no-frills nightclub gave an early start to Norah Jones and the Lumineers and hosted countless singer-songwriters in three locations over almost 18 years.

headline.main: The Living Room to Close at the End of December
